title: 'Good soap'
body: The fragrance of the soap is very good. It's also reducing tan from my skin. I liked this soap.

title: 'Bleech agent'
body: I didn't expect this soap could make skin very dry and bleach. The soap lasts for just 15 days for 2 person. Fragrance was good but they have added bleaching agents which is not good for the skin.

title: 'Great Ayurveda soap'
body: 'It lists all the ingredients and most are natural. Not for very dry skinned people. I love it and the smell of natural herbs is awesome. Its a great alternative to brands like khadi which are quite expensive. Its better than margo and other natural ingredient soaps.'

title: 'Good soap with nice fragrance'
body: 'Got at good offer and the fragrance is ok'

title: 'Very good soap'
body: There's only two types of comments people would feel after using this soap. They'll either like it totally or dislike it totally. I like it very much.  Smell is not that good but almost everything else is good. Creamy, dependable cleaning.  The only con? The soap breaks after two days of non-usage. That's not acceptable for two days of use and non-use. It's understandable when it's almost over. But a new soap? No, it should not crack.  That said, it's such a relief to take bath with this soap. There's a feeling of freshness and vitality.

title: 'Shop is not skin shop .shop is toilet shop. Amazon paking not available this product.'

title: 'This soap delivers much more than it promises.'
body: 'My son who is so difficult to please loved this soap.He has some skin problems and Chandrikha really helped.Now I will supply my grand kids and my kids with Chandrikha as its the best.I found the smell pleasant
column5: and the feeling of freshness after using it great.And it did help with ordinary skin problems like pimples and even to some extent eczema..'

title: 'Severely harmful for skin'
body: 'This soap is severely harmful for the skin causing effect like burnt skin. I have never experienced such a scary effect of any soap. The manufacturers must check the composition immediately.'

title: 'Very good soap'
body: Me , nd my family used several Brad's soap , lastly we switched to dove ( green one ) but it's price fluctuate frequently nd sometimes it's unavailable , so faced a great problem , then finally bought this soap . It is miracle . It's foam is great nd clear skin very good giving natural glow . If you have oily sensitive skin .......then definitely switch to this soap . It's awesome .....
